name: Ultimate Tic-Tac-Toe (itch) (Jean-David Moisan)
description:
To play a multiplayer game, launch the game. A Settings.json file will be created next to the game executable. Edit the IP address to be the host's IP address. Press Enter to connect to them. The host should have port 6121 open.

Source code: https://github.com/Apostolique/UltimateTicTacToe

tictactoe tic tac toe tic-tac-toe
